resources.string: You can complete your KYC by using your AADHAAR number and the OTP sent to the mobile or email registered on your AADHAAR number.
An OTP has been sent via SMS
Connect your AADHAAR, get 25 off on Processing Fees. Your loan will be approved much faster as you do not need to submit Proof of ID and Proof of Address

"

The Kissht App allows you to buy all items from within the App. You can see all of our Merchant Partners within our app or choose to buy items from the Kissht store. You can also use to app to upload your documents and to make the downpayment and processing fees.

For customers who have ongoing loans, you can use the app to check your available line of credit or to make an early payment or to view upcoming EMIs and Invoices for the same.

© 2019 Kissht. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. kissht.com (ONEMi Technology Solutions Private Limited) is an EMI payment and digital lending platform. With a variety of EMI payment options like EMI on Credit Card, EMI on Debit Card & EMI without Card, Kissht (ONEMi) aims at empowering online as well as offline Merchant stores to provide easy and quick EMI to customers who wish to purchase Mobiles, Laptops, Jewelry, Cameras, Furniture’s, AC, Watches, Home & Kitchen Appliances, Tour Package, Health Packages and many more on easy EMI through our tie ups with 20 + financial Institutions across the country. Our unique EMI payment gateway makes aspiration affordable to all. Our EMI payment gateway allows our merchant partners to offer quick loan EMI, Credit card EMI as well as select Debit card EMI from various leading Banks and NBFCs including HDFC, HSBC, CITI Bank, Kotak, IndusInd, ICICI, Axis, Standard Chartered, SBI Bank, RBL Bank & Bajaj FinServ. India's largest EMI centric payment solution company, Kissht offers a hassle-free experience of shopping online as well as offline Merchant stores by offering quick and Easy EMI at Point of Sale. Our EMI Payments Gateway integration uses super simple APIs to go live instantly. With a wide range of products across various categories and convenient EMIs on debit cards, credit cards & quick loan EMI, get set to enjoy a simple, stress-free and smart online as well as offline shopping experience with Kissht ( ONEMi )

"The screenshots of your bank app are not accepted. It should include transactions from last 3 months till this month. For example: if you are uploading the statement on April 15th, please upload the statement from Jan 1 to April 15. "If salaried: "Please upload the bank statement in which you receive your salary. "If self-employed: Please upload the bank statement of account you use on regular basis.
Please upload an image of the Credit Card. This must have the user name on the credit card. You also need to upload an image of the charge slip for the amount of downpayment and processing fee.
Please make sure that bank account details, including account number and IFSC code, is same as the details you provided.
Please upload an image of the Debit Card. This must have the user name on the debit card. You also need to upload an image of the charge slip for the amount of downpayment and processing fee.
Please make sure that the PAN number and image is clearly visible.
Please upload your selfie. Pictures of your passport size photos are not accepted.
